      • getProfileInformation

        public java.util.List getProfileInformation()
                                     throws PdfAsException
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Returns the list of information objects about activated profiles available in the configuration.

        Note: Currently the profile information consists of the profile Id and the MOA Key Id only.

        Note: In near future the profile management will be moved out of the config file into an API class representation of the profiles which may render this (and related) methods obsolete.

        Specified by:
        getProfileInformation in interface PdfAs
        Returns:
        Returns the list of SignatureProfile objects with information about active profiles available in the configuration.
        Throws:
        PdfAsException - Thrown on error.
        See Also:
        SignatureProfile

      • createDynamicSignatureProfile

        public DynamicSignatureProfile createDynamicSignatureProfile(java.lang.String parentProfile,
                                                    DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum mode)
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Create a signature profile dynamically. You have do apply() it for usage. See SignatureProfile.
        Specified by:
        createDynamicSignatureProfile in interface PdfAs
        Parameters:
        parentProfile - a parent profile id to inherit all properties
        mode - lifetime mode
        Returns:
        the created signature profile to work with.

      • createDynamicSignatureProfile

        public DynamicSignatureProfile createDynamicSignatureProfile(java.lang.String myUniqueName,
                                                    java.lang.String parentProfile,
                                                    DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum mode)
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Create a signature profile dynamically. You have to provide a unique name and have do apply() it for usage. See SignatureProfile. It is recommended to use PdfAs.createDynamicSignatureProfile(String, DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum) that generates a unique name on its own.
        Specified by:
        createDynamicSignatureProfile in interface PdfAs
        Parameters:
        myUniqueName - a unique name for the profile
        parentProfile - a parent profile id to inherit all properties
        mode - lifetime mode
        Returns:
        the created signature profile to work with.
        See Also:
        DynamicSignatureProfile

      • createEmptyDynamicSignatureProfile

        public DynamicSignatureProfile createEmptyDynamicSignatureProfile(DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum mode)
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Create a signature profile dynamically. You have fill it with properties and apply() it for usage. See SignatureProfile.
        It is recommended to use PdfAs.createDynamicSignatureProfile(String, DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum) that inherits from an existing profile saving you a lot of work.
        Specified by:
        createEmptyDynamicSignatureProfile in interface PdfAs
        Parameters:
        mode - lifetime mode
        Returns:
        the created signature profile to work with.
        See Also:
        DynamicSignatureProfile

        Create a signature profile dynamically. You have fill it with properties and apply() it for usage. See SignatureProfile.
        It is recommended to use PdfAs.createDynamicSignatureProfile(String, DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum) that inherits from an existing profile saving you a lot of work.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        mode - lifetime mode
        Returns:

      • loadDynamicSignatureProfile

        public DynamicSignatureProfile loadDynamicSignatureProfile(java.lang.String profileName)
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Loads an existing dynamic signature profile by its name. Profiles are saved when they are applied and it has DynamicSignatureLifetimeEnum.MANUAL
        Specified by:
        loadDynamicSignatureProfile in interface PdfAs
        Returns:
        the signature profile or null if not found.
        See Also:
        DynamicSignatureProfile

      • prepareSign

        public SignatureDetailInformation prepareSign(SignParameters signParameters)
                                       throws PdfAsException
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Prepares the signature of the given PDF document. The table for the signature data is placed but not filled.
        Usually used for preview.
        Specified by:
        prepareSign in interface PdfAs
        Parameters:
        signParameters - The sign parameters.
        Returns:
        Only the SignatureDetailInformation.getSignaturePosition(), SignatureDetailInformation.getNonTextualObjects(), SignatureDetailInformation.getSignatureData() are filled.
        Throws:
        PdfAsException - if something goes wrong during the process

      • finishSign

        public SignResult finishSign(SignParameters signParameters,
                    SignatureDetailInformation signatureDetailInformation)
                      throws PdfAsException
        Description copied from interface: PdfAs
        Finish the signature process. The PDF is filled with the signature data.
        Usually used if some steps like the actual signing are to be performed externally.
        Specified by:
        finishSign in interface PdfAs
        Parameters:
        signParameters - The sign parameters.
        signatureDetailInformation - The signature detail information.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PdfAsException
